item.title: About Me
item.description: I am the Principal Architect at Orbis, a global non-profit organization aiming at eliminating preventable blindness worldwide. 🌍 Location(s) Born and grew up in Switzlerland 🇨🇭 Based in the UK 🇬🇧 since 2009. 💼 Professional Experience More information on my LinkedIn page. Principal Architect @ Orbis International Principal AI Architect @ Orbis International CTO @ Predina (AI for road safety) CTO @ Visulytix (AI in Ophthalmology) (Senior) Research Associate at UCL Computer Science 🎓 Education PhD in Biomedical Image Processing @ University College London (CoMPLEX + Biochemical Engineering) M.

item.title: How to Build a Machine Learning Demo in 2022
item.description: Learn why you should build demos for your Machine Learning models in 2022, and how to do it in a way that fits your needs, skills, and audience.

item.title: Good practices for neural network training: identify, save, and document best models
item.description: An introduction to the good practice of best model saving when training a neural network, and a practical implementation using fastai and Weights & Biases
